Below you can find a detailed description of how exactly these people can help you according to their roles within EPAM Anywhere Program.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CAPABILITY MANAGER / RESOURCE MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM Anywhere all the traditional resource management functions are performed via the verticalized services. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It means, that you should address all the RM-related queries not to RM directly, but to the operational support group of capability managers. Just write down your question to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFA Anywhere Assistance@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Assistance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" via Outlook.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Topics to refer:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" NON-technical issues with Time, Vacation, Learn, Benefits; work from another country; rotation to another project; relocation; compensation review; exits; etc. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All technical issues as VPN, DUO, OPSWAT, Dual Boot, etc. should be directed to Support Portal.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation-related questions should be addressed to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFA Anywhere Salary@epm.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ANYWHERE ASSISTANT CHATBOT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM Anywhere program we encourage self-service, so you can ask the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/AW-Assistant-chatbot\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ANYWHERE ASSISTANT CHATBOT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". This digital HR assistant knows answers to all the not project-specific questions and is ready to help you 24/7 in all our locations. Follow the link, pin the bot to your MS teams chats not to lose, and start chatting! If the chatbot fails to answer your question – feel free to use the Ask Expert option to get personalized assistance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PERSONAL STAFFING CONTACT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing is finding positions within EPAM. Project matching is our process of selecting a project out of the current open positions at EPAM Anywhere that matches the candidate’s preferences best and assigning that candidate to the project. Project matching is a completely separate process that starts right after the candidate joins the company and runs parallel to onboarding. Every candidate has their own Personal Staffing Contact responsible for searching and proposing relevant open positions as well as supporting the candidate throughout the process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To understand the staffing process better, look through this fancy and easy-to-understand \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://anywhere.epam.com/api/file-download?fileName=Staffing_EN.pdf&uid=bltef29238442c03d79\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing one-pager\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Outlook contact group for staffing is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywhereSupplyOwners@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Supply Owners\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SKILL ADVISOR\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask them questions about your professional development plan, career growth and recommendations of learning options; consult in your technology stack. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To take advantage of their help you need to apply to \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=2db10f8b-380e-4f58-aeed-1bdc7cda29a6\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skill Advisory Service\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MENTOR\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we have many mentoring programs aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new technologies. Mentor is a person who has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the professional area, motivated to spend personal time for knowledge transfer. If you feel that your expertise needs to be developed or want to acquire new skills and knowledge required for working on a project, you can take part in our Mentoring program where you will be given a Mentor. You can learn more about Mentoring programs PARTNER\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Will help with your integration into EPAM Anywhere program, advice on employment conditions and other work aspects (except project-specific), EPAM processes and resources, and assist with soft skills development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DELIVERY / PROJECT MANAGER, TEAM LEADER\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can also contact your Delivery Manager (DM), Project Manager (PM) and Team Leader (TL) with any questions related to all project activities: tasks, communication with the client, team, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: to contact a customer – better to refer to your Project Lead\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We encourage you to be proactive and not hesitate to schedule a meeting with any of your contacts if you have any questions or concerns. You will learn how to create meetings on the upcoming page 'Outlook'.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
